Notes: Deals 50 damage without backstab.  Cannot hit multiple targets in one stab.
Takes ~160ms to fire the 1st shot. Various methods of optimizing TTK: https://i.imgur.com/DLfa7hv.jpeg (qm = quick melee). TTK does not account for projectile travel time.

Takes ~640ms to charge a shot. Various methods of optimizing TTK: https://i.imgur.com/DLfa7hv.jpeg (qm = quick melee). TTK does not account for projectile travel time.  Damage increases from 60 to 120 (continuously) based on how long this weapon was charged.
Bullets are hitscan up until 40m, and then converted into a projectile afterwards.
TTK does not account for projectile travel time, or the initial delay when throwing the knives.  It represents more of a "time-to-death" calculation, if anything.
